means: 坎帕尼亚区（意大利行政区名）

sentence.Network_en: The old record - breaking Cunard liner Campania had just been sold for scrap.
sentence.Network_cn: 丘纳德公司老掉牙的破纪录邮船“坎帕尼亚号”刚刚被作为废钢出售了.

sentence.Network_en: Campania has been plagued by refuse trouble for 14 years.
sentence.Network_cn: 坎帕尼亚已经被这种拒绝倾倒垃圾的麻烦折磨了14年.

sentence.Network_en: The underlying problem is that Campania has no modern incinerators.
sentence.Network_cn: 背后的问题是坎帕尼亚没有现代化的焚烧炉.

PerfectNetExp.abs: campanello 坎帕内洛, campania 坎帕尼亚, campanero 坎帕内罗

means.word_mean: 1. a region of southwestern Italy on the Tyrrhenian Sea including the islands of Capri and Ischia

auth_sentence.content: The investigation is part of a broader audit of EU-funded projects in Campania, currently under way.
